member.name: M:Ebaas.WebApi.Utils.AttachmentLoader.LoadInstanceAttachments
member.summary: Upload instance attachments onto the database.
member.remarks: The obj_ids contained in attachment.xml file represents the obj_ids in the backup database. since the instances are recreated in the new database, the obj_ids of the newly created instances are changed. therefore, we need to use the obj_id mappings to find the new obj_id using the old obj_id.

member.name: M:Ebaas.WebApi.Utils.AttachmentLoader.LoadImages
member.summary: Upload instance images onto the database.
member.remarks: The obj_ids contained in image file names represents the obj_ids in the backup database. since the instances are recreated in the new database, the obj_ids of the newly created instances are changed. therefore, we need to use the obj_id mappings to replace the old obj_id with the new one.
